scripts.build: npx remotion render src/index.ts PromoVideo out/promo-video.mp4
scripts.build:story: npx remotion render src/index.ts InstagramStory out/instagram-story.mp4
scripts.build:showcase: npx remotion render src/index.ts ProductShowcase out/product-showcase.mp4
scripts.build:intro: npx remotion render src/index.ts StoreIntro out/store-intro.mp4
scripts.build:drop: npx remotion render src/index.ts DropAnnouncement out/drop-announcement.mp4
scripts.build:all: npx remotion render src/index.ts PromoVideo out/promo-video.mp4 && npx remotion render src/index.ts InstagramStory out/instagram-story.mp4 && npx remotion render src/index.ts ProductShowcase out/product-showcase.mp4 && npx remotion render src/index.ts StoreIntro out/store-intro.mp4 && npx remotion render src/index.ts DropAnnouncement out/drop-announcement.mp4
